1.description: Victor of the 74th Hunger Games, struggling with PTSD and President Snow's threats.
Co-victor trying to protect Katniss while maintaining their fake romance.

11.description: Charismatic victor from District 4, secretly part of the rebellion.
Fierce victor from District 7 who hates the Capitol.

15.description: Intelligent but traumatized victor from District 3.

11.description: Elderly victor from District 4, Finnick's mentor.

7.description: New Head Gamemaker, secretly a rebel leader.
